Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER out of all Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE events
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurrences in variants that include Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER is followed by Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE compared to all occurrences of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER relative to the frequency of Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events that eventually lead to a completed Payment Handled
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of variants starting with Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and containing Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that are re-submitted within two months (based on case timeline inferred from event log structure)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Ratio of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events with case:Amount above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that occur after a prior approval by PRE_APPROVER in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in domestic declaration cases versus pre-paid travel cost cases (inferred from process context)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER that result in abandonment (i.e., no subsequent Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases where 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' does not happen

Name: Average number of times Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER appears per case across all variants
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER occurring in variants with more than one rejection cycle
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events that are not followed by any further activity in the case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER relative to total activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER in cases handled by STAFF MEMBER versus other resources
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities == 'STAFF MEMBER' where ma is the last value of org:resource

Name: Ratio of successful re-submissions (leading to Payment Handled) after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER compared to total re-submissions following such rejection
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER events occurring in 2017 versus 2018
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER out of all rejection activities (including Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER, Declaration REJECTED by MISSING)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' out of all cases
